plot outline: Siddhanth is an NRI Kannadiga, who is a botanist and has a photographic memory. The sudden murder of his neighbors, an elderly couple from Coorg, sends him on a trip to find out more about the same. He encounters some strange experiences after that.
title: Ratnamanjarii
plot: A botanist with photographic memory takes interest in a recurring nightmare and decides to dig deeper, only to stumble on a murder mystery.

Siddhanth is an NRI Kannadiga, who is a botanist and has a photographic memory. The sudden murder of his neighbors, an elderly couple from Coorg, sends him on a trip to find out more about the same. He encounters some strange experiences after that.::Sunayana Suresh
